content: this pattern is a free video tutorial on my youtube channel a pdf version is available for purchase on my website- https //www amenagerieofstitches com/collections/patterns/products/crochet-pattern-mini-snowman-winter-scene-pdf-amigurumi-pattern walking in a winter wonderland… nothing says winter like a snowman i ve created the cutest little snowman that won t melt and he s ready to be added to your winter decorations this snowman winter scene can be completed in just one hour this is a great project to finish in one afternoon and is great for as a last minute gift this piece is one that you ll want to keep on display all season long perfect for a mantle bookshelf or wherever you like to add your decorations along with the snowman pattern i ve also included two finishing techniques for you to choose from this pattern includes step-by-step photos and directions to help you along as you make it there is also a full video tutorial on my youtube channel for guidance crochet pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight yarn size d/3 25mm crochet hook two pairs of 6mm safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch marker straight pins hot glue gun wood slice or snow globe depending how you want to finish it bottle brush trees mini presents mini pom poms felt snowflake sequins skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain slip_stitch finished measurement snowman measures 2 5 inches tall and 1 5 inches wide wood slice scene measures 4 5 inches tall and 4 5 inches wide snow globe measures 4 25 inches tall and 3 inches wide please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use as well as how you decide to finish it
